oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bovine mastitis prevalence and associated risk factors in dairy cows in Nyagatare District, Rwanda
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Blaise, Iraguha
Borden, Mushonga
Humphrey, Hamudukwanda
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: milk quality
subclinical mastitis
causative bacteria
risk factors
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In response to farmer requests after milk from their herds was rejected by processors due to poor quality, we conducted a study to investigate the prevalence of subclinical mastitis in dairy herds in the Nyagatare district of the Eastern province of Rwanda. The major causative bacteria were investigated and conclusions of the types of mastitis and risk factors thereof were assessed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2012; 249
